protein.specific_function: Guanine nucleotide-binding proteins (G proteins) are involved as modulators or transducers in various transmembrane signaling systems. The G(s) protein is involved in hormonal regulation of adenylate cyclase:it activates the cyclase in response to beta-adrenergic stimuli

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
